meta.title: Golden Retriever Car Anxiety: Travel Tips
meta.description: Does your Golden hate car rides? Learn how to reduce travel anxiety and motion sickness for stress-free trips.

solutions.title: Short, Happy Trips
solutions.description: Drive to the park, not just the vet. Build positive associations.

solutions.title: Secure Restraint
solutions.description: A crash-tested harness or crate can make them feel more secure.

solutions.title: Ginger or Meds
solutions.description: Consult your vet about motion sickness medication.
